item.description:
No one wants to think about it - those extra folds around our brains that just appeared one day. You stop writing for a week, and then a month, and suddenly your brain can't fit into a reasonable size anymore. You realize you're climbing higher on the BMI (Brain Mass Index), but none of it is muscle. What's a health-seeking brain to do?

Try Brain in Shape! For only 1 easy installment of $0, you can get those folds under control with our patented writing exercises system! Have FUN while bringing that BMI back back into a healthy, happy range.

And if you RSVP within the next 30 minutes, we'll offer you a completely EXTRA exercise, at no additional cost to you!

So act today! And get that Brain in Shape!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be outside on the benches in front of JP Licks, and if Mother Nature doesn't feel like getting HER Brain in Shape, we'll move across the street to Blue Shirt.
item.name: Brain in Shape! Exercise System - Order Today!
